title: Mark Sandman (Morphine) & V.A. - downloads from Hi-n-Dry (20
description:
Hi-n-Dry is a Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA-based independent record label and recording studio. Founded by Morphine singer and bassist Mark Sandman, the studio and label are currently managed by former Morphine bandmates Dana Colley and Billy Conway along with Laurie Sargent and Andrew Mazzone.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Description from store.hindry.com (now this site doesn't work)


The Mark Sandman Music Project and HI-N-DRY welcome you to join us in celebrating the life and music of Mark Sandman. Beginning on July 3rd, and continuing every week until September 20th, you are invited to download MP3s from an amazingly diverse selection of Mark's compositions. All tribute recording proceeds go towards our mission of providing young people with opportunities for creative collaboration.
--------------------------------------------------------------

format: mp3
bitrate: ~192 kbps
number of files: 24
